sentence.Network_en: They will be in raptures over the French countryside.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们会深深爱上法国的乡村。

sentence.Network_en: Motorways actually cover less than 0.1 percent of the countryside.
sentence.Network_cn: 高速公路的实际覆盖面积还不到农村地区的0.1%。

sentence.Network_en: The Moselle winds through some 160 miles of tranquil countryside.
sentence.Network_cn: 摩泽尔河在宁静的乡间蜿蜒穿行约160英里。

entry.def: The countryside is land which is away from towns and cities.

example.ex: I've always loved the English countryside...
example.tran: 一直以来我都很喜欢英国的乡间。

example.ex: We are surrounded by lots of beautiful countryside.
example.tran: 我们周边是大片美丽的乡村地区。

Sentence.sentence: Democrats and Republicans cooperate on crucial issues At some point in 2008, someone, probably in either Asia or Africa, made the decision to move from the countryside to the city
An influential figure decided to move from the countryside to the city
enjoy the beautiful view of the countryside

sentences.en: The countryside is very green in spring.
sentences.cn: 春季的乡间一片青葱翠绿。

sentences.en: The rising curtain revealed a countryside scene.
sentences.cn: 幕启时展现一幅农村景象。

jushi.english: Modern agriculture is spoiling our beautiful countryside.
jushi.chinese: 现代农业正在损坏我们美丽的农村。

jushi.english: The searchers scattered all over the countryside looking for her.
jushi.chinese: 那些搜寻的人分散到乡下各处去寻找她。

jushi.english: The old retired couple loves the peace of the countryside.
jushi.chinese: 退休的老两口喜欢乡间的宁静。
